meanings.definition: Formed by the aggregation of large particles.
meanings.sent1: The macroaggregated rocks were easy to spot due to their size.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the macroaggregated data to find patterns.
meanings.sent3: The macroaggregated clouds looked like fluffy cotton balls in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The macroaggregated crowd at the concert created a sea of waving hands.
meanings.sent5: The macroaggregated puzzle pieces made it easier to see the big picture.

meanings.sent1: She macroaggregated the sand to build a sturdy castle.
meanings.sent2: The machine can macroaggregate the ingredients quickly for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: He macroaggregated the colorful beads into a beautiful necklace.
meanings.sent4: The artist macroaggregated the paint to create a textured masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef macroaggregated the spices to enhance the flavor of the dish.
